resources.author: suejeanne
resources.post: Saw the program on the History Channel today (01-25-11) – so interesting – makes sense how the carbon dating could have used a sample from a newer section and thus indicated a later date – I recall how gleeful some friends and relatives were when they informed me that carbon dating (in the 1980’s) had been performed and the whole thing was a fake.  In 1981, there was a wonderful exhibit at Brooks Institute in Santa Barbara about the research on the Shroud – I went to that (having recently started taking classes to become a Catholic, I read about the exhibit in a Catholic newspaper I found at church) – there were cards of various sizes with the image on it, I bought quite a few of them to give to friends and relatives – I was just so thrilled to have seen this.  Couldn’t it have been like a photograph imprinted on the cloth from incredible light emanating during the Lord’s resurrection?  It was nice to see Mr. Swortz on the program – I always look for him when I hear there is something on the tv about the Shroud.
resources.title: Reminder: The Real Face of Jesus Airs Today on the History Channel
